resources.string: Common in India for good actors to not get opportunities: Saif

Talking about some of his Omkara co-actors, Saif Ali Khan said, They come up purely through talent, while some of us, frankly…had doors opened for us by privilege of our birth. He further said that, therefore, earning their respect by performing well felt really important. It happens a lot in India that good actors…dont get opportunities some privileged people do, Saif added.

He further said that, therefore, earning their respect by performing well felt really important. It happens a lot in India that good actors…dont get opportunities some privileged people do, Saif added.
